Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: WinXP,Win7 x32,Win7 x64,Win8 x32,Win8 x64,Win10 x32,Win10 x64,Win11 x32,Win11 x64,Win12 x32,Win12 x64,Win Other
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Updated the performance of the spreadsheet and its various applications that are included.

English.Char_Desc_80: A free professional spreadsheet application for the latest Windows systems.
English.Char_Desc_250: This powerful and professional free spreadsheet has all the tools you need to calculate, analyse, summarise, and present your data in numerical reports or colourful graphics. A fully-integrated help system makes entering complex formulas a breeze.
English.Char_Desc_450: This powerful and professional free spreadsheet application has all the tools you need to calculate, analyse, summarise, and present your data in numerical reports or colourful graphics. A fully-integrated help system makes entering complex formulas a breeze. Pull in external data using ODBC, sort it, and produce subtotals and statistical analyses. SSuite Axcel Professional also has ODBC connectivity to query any database on your PC through SQL.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
SSuite Axcel is a professional, very useful, and practical spreadsheet application for everyday use at home or the office, and it's also absolutely and completely free!
This powerful spreadsheet application has all the tools you need to calculate, analyse, summarise, and present your data in numerical reports or colourful graphics. A fully-integrated help system makes entering complex formulas a breeze. Pull in external data using ODBC, sort it, and produce subtotals and statistical analyses. Use the chart wizard to select from eight or more categories of 2-D and 3-D charts including line, area, column, pie, XY, stock and with dozens of variants.
Whether you are producing financial reports or managing personal expenses, SSuite Axcel Professional gives you more efficiency and flexibility to accomplish your goals. With a few mouse-clicks, you can reorganize your spreadsheet to show or hide certain data ranges, or to format ranges according to special conditions, or to quickly calculate subtotals and totals. SSuite Axcel Professional lets you present spreadsheet data in dynamic charts that update automatically when the data changes.
What's new in this version:
- Updated the Read Me document. - Added the Basic-Spreadsheet document format. - Updated the Help files with improved descriptions and images. - Updated and Enhanced the interface, refined user-actions and menu icons.
Try our new free [Online Office Suite] or our own [Web Search Engine]:
https://office.ssuiteoffice.com or https://groot.ssuiteoffice.com/
Installation Instructions: Open and read the "Read Me" file first for best user experience and software performance after installation.
New Online Edition: https://carbonplus.ssuiteoffice.com/
Minimum Requirements: 1366 x 768 Display Size and ALL Windows Systems x86 / x64
